effect.short: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks the target at full power. The
attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.
